title: Is Bitcoin’s Dominance Slipping as Altcoins Gain Steam?
description: Bitcoin’s (CRYPTO: BTC) dominance sits around 60% as November trading turns choppy. Prices have dropped below $100,000, pushing the broader crypto market lower and shifting attention toward emerging altcoins that are holding up better. Bitcoin’s pullback has investors asking: Can it maintain market leadership, or are altcoins ready to take over? Bitcoin’s Three-Month Price Performance ... title: How Low Will Bitcoin Go Before It Makes a New All-Time High?
description: I have to admit, when I first pitched this piece, the title I was going after was “Will Bitcoin Hit Five Digits Before It Makes a New All-Time High?” Well, Bitcoin did just do that this week, faster than I could possibly type. title: Bitcoin to $75K or $125K: This Is Where It Is Heading Next
description: After a red-hot summer, it looks like “crypto winter” is here and Bitcoin (CRYPTO:BTC) is back in the headlines. The BTC price is moving fast, but not necessarily in a positive direction. This raises the question of whether it’s time to buy the Bitcoin dip or brace for lower prices.
